text: Sredi etikh litsemerov yest' i takiye, kotoryye poritsayut tebya (o Mukhammad!) i osuzhdayut za razdachu toboyu milostyni i dobychi. Ikh interesuyet tol'ko zemnoy mir, yego blaga i privilegii. Yesli ty im dash' to, chto oni khotyat, oni budut dovol'ny tvoyey razdachey, yesli im ne dat', oni serdyatsya i gnevayutsya
